TopicTitle: [0.24] Bargain Rocket Parts v1.1 - Bust out the duct tape, we're going to space!

Articles.Content: Can you make nodes before Start with TreeEdit so it doesn't affect the stock and mod parts?

oh ok... I kinda figured modifying the config would get me the results I wanted; that way, I can have a 'shoestring budget' line, without having me lose all my ships already out there. btw, I find the parts actually useful; when they introduce supply and currency for career mode, I will be using these parts extensively (big emphasis on extensively)

Edited November 25, 2013 by mr. engino
Good job, this is one of the best silly mods I've seen since the Wacky Wood Wares mod.
Love your mod, only one problem so far: the docking port doesn't seem to un-dock. Idk, maybe it's supposed to be like that? Great mod though.

Love your mod, only one problem so far: the docking port doesn't seem to un-dock. Idk, maybe it's supposed to be like that? Great mod though.

That's a bug in the base game (according to devs, will be fixed in next patch).
Wait, so none of the docking ports work now? D:

Wait, so none of the docking ports work now? D:

by all means no. it just means that the ports supplied by THIS mod doesn't undock. the stock ones work fine.
The undocking bug affects the stock parts too, do a search...

The undocking bug affects the stock parts too, do a search...

guess what? you are completely wrong. the stock docking ports work fine. I checked myself.

Since you cant do a search here it is for you:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35777-Can-t-Undock-Bug-How-To-Fix

You are welcome.

by all means no. it just means that the ports supplied by THIS mod doesn't undock. the stock ones work fine.

Do the ports of the mod never work or is it just the one and only you have tried out yet?

The undock bug roots in the game itself and can strike any time/under as of now not completely certain circumstances.
Awesome, this really gives KSP a playfull littlebigplanet feeling!
We need a re textured kerbal to go with this mod!

Been playing with this with my little Kerbals and both they and I have a couple of requests

Any chance of some Bamboo or Duck Tape struts?

Also, as we are MechJeb bound (none of us can fly rockets) any chance of a model for MJ along the lines of an old Uher reel to reel tape deck ... http://www.reelprosoundguys.com/images/1957_UHER_295.jpg ... And don't forget the 'magic eye'

I know it is cheeky to ask, but not to ask is not to get.

This mod is not something i woudl use often in my designs, but whatever.. this is simply awesome.

I always liked sense of humor in KSP, rockets made from scrap, but you guys took it to whole new level. Bassicly every part idea, description of it made me into bursts of laught.

Great work!
Awesome! LOVE IT!
I found a bit on the typo. With the SL-2 parachute, the description should read Kerbin, not Earth.

I found a bit on the typo. With the SL-2 parachute, the description should read Kerbin, not Earth.

I was a little confused about that, too. What is this "Earth" thing, anyway?

I came across this artist SimÃƒÂ³n Vega and thought about this thread.

It might inspire something?

Hey all,

I noticed that this mod has not had any activity in a while. Please don't let it die . I really liked it. I feel some of the parts are a little overpowered, but overall it is awesome. Great job Rubber Ducky!

Hey all,

I noticed that this mod has not had any activity in a while. Please don't let it die . I really liked it. I feel some of the parts are a little overpowered, but overall it is awesome. Great job Rubber Ducky!

Guess RubberDucky got all hands full with the development of his serviceable Space Telescope Mod.
SimÃƒÂ³n Vega's art gives new meaning to "space junk".
Haha great idea, very creative!

Guess RubberDucky got all hands full with the development of his serviceable Space Telescope Mod.

Yeah, pretty much all of my free development time is dedicated to CactEye, and I've actually got another promising project lined up after that. I certainly haven't forgotten about this mod, though, hopefully I'll be able to update it at some point (if I don't exhaust myself).
will this work with .23? I really want to try this mod
